snippet: Some of the people who have helped broadcast the Occupy Wall Street movement were forced to leave a Brooklyn building they were using for their work.
abstract: Some of the people who have helped broadcast the Occupy Wall Street movement were forced to leave a Brooklyn building they were using for their work.

headline.main: A Documenter of Protests Has a Run-In of His Own
headline.print_headline: Documenter Of Protests Has Run-In Of His Own
